resources.string:
Password Generator will generate random passwords based on the strength you choose. You can then copy the generated password to your clipboard and use it. 

Why Should I use strong passwords? 
A Strong password is hard to guess and more secure in cases of Cyber attacks. 

This app is completely offline, so you don't have to worry about eve's dropping while accessing your passwords.

string.name: set_master_pass
string.i: You will enter this password to retrieve all saved passwords in this app. Please do not forget this password.

resources.string: Passwords don\'t match. Please enter the passwords again.
Password must be 8 characters or more long and it must have at least one upper case letter, one lower case letter, one digit and one special character. Please enter the passwords again.
Something went wrong while retrieving your password!
